welcome.title: Welcome to Auto Claude
welcome.subtitle: Let's get you set up in a few simple steps. Auto Claude uses AI to help you manage tasks, review code, generate roadmaps, and accelerate your development workflow.

aiPowered.title: AI-Powered Development
aiPowered.description: Autonomous agents plan, build, and validate your code end-to-end.

specDriven.title: Spec-Driven Workflow
specDriven.description: AI creates detailed specs and implementation plans from your descriptions.

memory.title: Intelligent Memory
memory.description: Insights are retained across sessions for continuous improvement.

parallel.title: Parallel Execution
parallel.description: Run multiple AI agents simultaneously for faster development.

authChoice.title: Authentication Method
authChoice.description: Choose how you'd like to authenticate with Claude.

oauth.title: Claude OAuth
oauth.description: Sign in with your Anthropic account for seamless authentication.

apiKey.title: API Key
apiKey.description: Enter your Anthropic API key manually.

apiKey.title: API Key Setup
apiKey.description: Enter your Anthropic API key to enable AI features.
apiKey.label: API Key
apiKey.validationFailed: Invalid API key. Please check and try again.
apiKey.securityNote: Your API key is stored securely in your browser and sent only to the Auto Claude backend.

projectSetup.title: Connect a Project
projectSetup.description: Point Auto Claude at a project directory to get started.

dropZone.title: Drop a Project Folder
dropZone.description: Drag a folder here to set it as your project directory.

memory.title: Memory
memory.description: Configure persistent cross-session memory for agents
memory.contextDescription: Auto Claude Memory helps remember context across your coding sessions
memory.enableMemoryDescription: Persistent cross-session memory using LadybugDB (embedded database)
memory.memoryDisabledInfo: Memory is disabled. Session insights will be stored in local files only.
memory.enableAgentAccessDescription: Allow agents to search and add to the knowledge graph via MCP
memory.embeddingProviderDescription: Provider for semantic search (optional - keyword search works without)
memory.memoryInfo: Memory stores discoveries, patterns, and insights about your codebase so future sessions start with context already loaded.

completion.title: You're All Set!
completion.description: Auto Claude is ready to help you build better software. Start by creating your first task or exploring your project's codebase.
completion.setupCompleteDescription: Your environment is configured and ready.

createTask.title: Create a Task
createTask.description: Start by creating your first task to see Auto Claude in action.

customizeSettings.title: Customize Settings
customizeSettings.description: Fine-tune your preferences, configure integrations, or re-run this wizard.
